actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to limit the extension of the statute of limitations, in the case of an election by a taxpayer, to postpone a determination under the hobby loss rules, to the hobby loss issue alone and not to unrelated items on the taxpayer's return.

summary.text: Extends under the Internal Revenue Code the statutory period for the assessment of any deficiency attributable to the disallowance of a deduction incurred in an activity not engaged in for profit.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to limit the extension of the statute of limitations, in the case of an election by a taxpayer, to postpone a determination under the hobby loss rules, to the hobby loss issue alone and not to unrelated items on the taxpayer's return.
